name: Affliction
description: Affliction is a survival horror shooter designed to engage players with a thrilling storyline, surreal environments, merciless foes, a chilling atmosphere, and an unforgettable gameplay experience. Players must explore, scavenge, and fight in order to survive and live to tell the tale.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 7 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: May run on systems with lower specs, but with poor performance
